text:
42 workspace digital Invite

On 21 September 2021, UpStream Festival will host the exclusive superconnectors City Event at 42workspace.

The event will be a moment to socialize and assess the founders of the 20 semifinalist startups in a relaxed environment.

The event is with Invite only
Time: 5 pm

elements.text:
42 workspace digital Invite

On 21 September 2021, UpStream Festival will host the exclusive superconnectors City Event at 42workspace.

The event will be a moment to socialize and assess the founders of the 20 semifinalist startups in a relaxed environment.

The event is with Invite only
Time: 5 pm

text:
On 24 September 2021, UpStream Festival will host the *first Superconnectors events of Rotterdam!* 

*During the event, the 10* highest potential startups in the Netherlands will be connected with 20 previously unreachable Superconnectors. 
 
What will the 10 startups gain?
1. The founders will receive mentoring from superconnectors on how to ASK!
2. All founders will pitch their Critical Ask to get them fulfilled by the superconnectors.
3. Each startup gets access to the network of the superconnectors.
How can startups be a part of the superconnectors event?

• Before 6 September, founders must register their startups by:
    a. Filling their Ask in the *Lefthoek* _Ask Madlib format_ 
    b. Sending a one-page Lean Canvas. 
• From 6 to 21 September, the 10 startups will be chosen after 2 rounds of assessment.

Each startup gets access to the network of the superconnectors.

Lefthoek

Sending a one-page Lean Canvas.

text: <https://www.bloovi.be/artikels/stories/2021/vrouwelijk-duo-achter-capitalt-neemt-pioniersrol-ter-harte-ambitie-is-om-het-beste-techfonds-van-europa-te-worden>

attachments.title: Vrouwelijk duo achter CapitalT neemt pioniersrol ter harte: “Ambitie is om het beste techfonds van Europa te worden”
attachments.text: Twee vrouwen aan het roer van een techfonds. Dat is zelfs in een vooruitstrevend en toonaangevend ondernemersland als Nederland nog steeds een zeldzaamheid. Sinds de lancering van hun investeringsfonds CapitalT in 2020 mogen Janneke Niessen en Eva de Mol zich dan ook heuse pioniers noemen. Opmerkelijk: CapitalT, dat sinds kort 45 miljoen euro in kas heeft, beoordeelt alle pitch decks - zo’n 200 per maand - door middel van een datagedreven model. Resultaat: meer diversiteit in de investeringsportefeuille. “Onze ambitie is om het beste fonds in Europa te worden.”
attachments.fallback: Bloovi: Vrouwelijk duo achter CapitalT neemt pioniersrol ter harte: “Ambitie is om het beste techfonds van Europa te worden”

text:
When teams start working together, a collective brain starts to develop. The HiveBrain is built through unconscious and conscious dynamics within the team. 

As the HiveBrain grows in strength the team becomes more likely to succeed.
